system.description:
At 3rd level when you choose this archetype, you become capable of holding your own in a scrap and to take the most brutal advantage of your dirty tricks. You gain the following benefits:

  • You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
  • You can attempt either the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-maneuvers.Item.zzg7j7cb0vkgctwi]{Knockdown} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-maneuvers.Item.md35qozzy2fxy2o6]{Shove} basic maneuver as a bonus action. Knockdown and Shove basic maneuvers made in this way use your clever tricks DC instead of your Maneuver DC.
  • Whenever you use a bonus action to trick a creature using @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.3cGP1YhxMt9Aiz9p]{Dirty Fighting} or to perform the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-maneuvers.Item.c0bv7fsy2akld5lp]{Disarm}, Knockdown, or Shove basic maneuvers and the target fails its saving throw, you may immediately make a weapon attack against that target as a part of the same bonus action.
